item.title: How do i make spawned npcs have full hp?
item.dc:creator: @eclipse245 eclipse245
item.description:
@eclipse245 wrote:

well first of all make sure you aren’t wearing a ‘p’ ring and if u still kill them then go into your npc.cfg file and change the health to whatever you want.
